item.description:
The South Windsor Jaycees are aiding in the efforts started by Nicole and Kevin Albuit of Flooring Solutions & More in Manchester. They have initiated a supply drive that has been spreading like wild fire via facebook and local news stories. We are collecting supplies until Friday, July 23rd.

We have a drop box located at the South Windsor Chamber of Commerce office which is located at 22 Morgan Farms Drive, South Windsor.

Items that can be dropped off include:
sheets
towels
disposable bed pads
q-tips
gauze pads
toothbrushes (new sealed in box)
dawn dish soap (original blue formula)
Pedialyte liters (unflavored)
pepto bismol (original liquid)
newspapers
duct tape
aluminum foil
nitrile gloves (no latex-petroleum products break those down)

All supplies will be given to Flooring Solutions & More on Broad Street in Manchester, CT. Nicole and Kevin Albuit are the ones that have initiated this drive and will be personally driving the supplies down to Louisiana at the end of the month.
item.how_to_find_us: There is a box at the entrance with a flyer attached
item.name: Gulf Oil Animal Rescue Supply Drive
